quote: She had become addicted to the buzz of the cancelled plan. It was a small and fleeting high and no one would ever look back fondly at all the times they'd managed to get out of something, but for a moment no words were sweeter to Marnie than "I'm sorry. I can't make it."
author: David Nicholls

quote: You are brilliant. Tell your mind to be kind to you today.
author: Olivie Blake
book: Alone With You in the Ether

quote: A life lived in a simulation is still a life.
author: Emily St. John Mandel

quote: Habituated loneliness was bearable, but the heart was not built to endure glimpses of what it could never truly have.
author: Ronan Hession

quote: If you have always been criticised, from before you can remember, it becomes more or less impossible to locate yourself in the time or space before the criticism was made: to believe, in other words, that you yourself exist.
author: Rachel Cusk

quote: The state of the world being what it is, humanity on the cusp of extinction, here I am writing another email about sex and friendship. What else is there to live for? Love always, Alice.
author: Sally Rooney

quote: I am overcome by awe, not because she looks like Reva, and i think it's her, almost exactly her, and not because I'll never see her again, but because she is beautiful. There she is, a human being, diving into the unknown, and she is wide awake.
author: Ottessa Moshfegh
book: My Year of Rest and Relaxation

quote: I have no money, no resources, no hopes. I am the happiest man alive. A year ago, six months ago, i thought I was an artist. I no longer think about it. I am.
author: Henry Miller

quote: What if life is just a collection of essentially unrelated experiences? Why does one thing have to follow meaningfully from another?
author: Sally Rooney

quote: I mean, I just lived my life in such a small way. It was too small. I was so convinced there was only one way to live my life.
author: Alison Espach
